continuousshots: Up to 5 Shots at 9.5 fps (Continuous H), (upto 24 Shots at 1.8 fps (Continuous L)
focallength: 4.5 - 81 mm (35 mm (135 mm) Equivalent to 25 - 450 mm)
isorating: Auto (Auto Gain ISO 160-800), Fixed Range Auto (ISO 160-400), High Speed Continuous (ISO 160-3200), Manual Selection (ISO 160 / 200 / 400 / 800 / 1600 / 3200)
whitebalancing: Auto, Cloudy, Daylight, Flash, Fluorescent, Incandescent, Manual
shootingmodes: Auto, Backlit Scene HDR, Continous, Movie, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Scene
